entry.title: 20FT x 10FT Royal Blue Metallic Shiny Spandex Glittering Backdrop
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3110
Type: Backdrops
Price: 69.99 - 188.97 (2 variants)

[About]

Material: Metallic Spandex
Color: Royal Blue
Edges: Serged
Size: 20ft. wide x 10ft. high
Size of Rod Pocket: 3"
Perfect for room divider, paired with our backdrop stands.
All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings, the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Pure piece of elegance! Our premium quality spandex backdrop linens are made from high quality spandex material that is highly durable, stretchable, and affordable. These extravagant backdrops can be used time and time again, without any need for ironing and can easily be laundered countless times without losing their luster and charm. The peerless glint of metallic hue coupled with the seamless luster of spandex material will exude oodles of imperial sheen and regal appeal to your party space.Â  Create a perfectly bedazzling duet of luminosity and glamour by complementing these glimmering spandex backdrops with spandex chair covers and caps, spandex tablecloths, spandex table runners, and other accessories in wedding, showers, banquet events, corporate affairs, quinceanera parties etc. Their stain resistant and wrinkle resistant properties make them a perfect choice for indoor and outdoor events, holiday parties, weddings and other festive celebrations where you desire to create an everlasting impression on your guests while still staying in budget.


Additional Information:

  • Material:Â Metallic Spandex
  • Size:Â 20ft wide x 10 ft heightÂ 
  • Edges:Â SergedÂ 
  • Color:Â Royal Blue
  • Size of Rod Pocket:Â 3 Inches
  • How to Care:Â Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat
  • Uses:Â Wedding, Party, Event, Photography, Exhibition Decoration
  • Note:Â Sale is for 1-pc backdrop linen only.Â Flowers, candelabra , other decorative items or additional fabric bolts NOT INCLUDED.
